trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará el evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de evento en el [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] se basa en tener un delegado de eventos que se conecta un evento con su controlador.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed:
trans-unit.target: Para generar un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento, se necesitan dos elementos:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> (clase), derivado de <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegado, que señala a un método que proporciona la respuesta al evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
